short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your tweets with AI-powered comments. Let TweetWizard craft the perfect reply in a flash!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to the X comment window that allows you to generate comments using AI that take into account a tweet's content and the author's bio. Notice you have to click the comment icon and enter the comment subwindow before the button shows up. You can pick a style from our predefined library, or write your own custom prompts.
